languages.text: {n}Арджента стискивает зубы.{/n} "Эта... еретичка не в первый раз становится причиной гибели экипажа. Помнишь бедствие на средней палубе, Идира? Чем те честные люди заслужили обратиться в мутантов и напасть на свои же семьи? Ты — чудовище. Еретик. Если в тебе осталась хоть капля человеческого — признай это!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента стискивает зубы.{/n} "Эта... еретичка не в первый раз становится причиной гибели экипажа. Помнишь эпизод при переходе к Кьява Гамма, Идира? А еще бедствие на средней палубе год назад! Несколько верных слуг Императора обратилась в мутантов! Теодора фон Валанциус всегда была слишком снисходительна к ее "ошибкам", которые теперь привели вот к этому!
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the incident on the mid-deck, Idira? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента стискивает зубы.{/n} "Эта... еретичка не в первый раз становится причиной гибели экипажа. Помнишь бедствие на средней палубе, Идира? Чем те честные люди заслужили обратиться в мутантов и напасть на свои же семьи? Ты — чудовище. Еретик. Если в тебе осталась хоть капля человеческого — признай это!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the crossing into Kiava Gamma, Indira? What about the incident on the mid-deck? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

What about the incident on the mid-deck? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"

What about the incident on the mid-deck? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the incident on the mid-deck, Idira? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔咬牙切齿。{/n}“这个……异端分子，已经不是第一次害死船员们了。你还记得中层甲板发生的那件事情吗，伊迪拉？那些诚实的灵魂究竟犯了什么错？他们被变成了变种人，还袭击了他们自己的家人，他们怎么会落得这样的下场？你就是个怪物，是个异端分子。如果你还有一丁点人性的话，就承认你的本质吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the incident on the mid-deck, Idira? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔咬牙切齿。{/n}“这个……异端分子，已经不是第一次害死船员们了。你还记得中层甲板发生的那件事情吗，伊迪拉？那些诚实的灵魂究竟犯了什么错？他们被变成了变种人，还袭击了他们自己的家人，他们怎么会落得这样的下场？你就是个怪物，是个异端分子。如果你还有一丁点人性的话，就承认你的本质吧！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta aprieta los dientes.{/n} «No es la primera vez que esta... hereje ha causado muertes entre la tripulación. ¿Recuerdas el incidente de la cubierta media, Idira? ¿Qué hicieron esas pobres almas trabajadoras para merecer aquel final? ¿Para convertirse en mutantes y atacar a sus propias familias? Eres un monstruo. Una hereje. ¡Si te queda un ápice de humanidad, admite lo que eres!».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the incident on the mid-deck, Idira? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta aprieta los dientes.{/n} «No es la primera vez que esta... hereje ha causado muertes entre la tripulación. ¿Recuerdas el incidente de la cubierta media, Idira? ¿Qué hicieron esas pobres almas trabajadoras para merecer aquel final? ¿Para convertirse en mutantes y atacar a sus propias familias? Eres un monstruo. Una hereje. ¡Si te queda un ápice de humanidad, admite lo que eres!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタが歯を食いしばる。{/n}「この異端者がクルーを死に至らしめたのは…今回が初めてではありません。中層デッキでの出来事を覚えているか、イディラ？あの誠実な魂が、そんな運命に値するようなことをしたのか？変異体にされ家族を襲うなどということをせねばならぬ者だったか？お前は怪物だ。異端者だ。人間性が残っているなら、自分の正体を認めろ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the incident on the mid-deck, Idira? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタが歯を食いしばる。{/n}「この異端者がクルーを死に至らしめたのは…今回が初めてではありません。中層デッキでの出来事を覚えているか、イディラ？あの誠実な魂が、そんな運命に値するようなことをしたのか？変異体にされ家族を襲うなどということをせねばならぬ者だったか？お前は怪物だ。異端者だ。人間性が残っているなら、自分の正体を認めろ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta knirscht mit ihren Zähnen.{/n} "Das ist nicht das erste Mal, dass diese ... Ketzerin den Tod ihrer Crew verursacht hat. Erinnert Ihr Euch an den Zwischenfall auf dem Mitteldeck, Idira? Was haben diese aufrichtigen Seelen getan, um ein solches Schicksal zu verdienen? In Mutanten verwandelt zu werden und ihre eigenen Familien anzugreifen? Ihr seid ein Monster. Eine Ketzerin. Falls noch eine Spur von Menschlichkeit in Euch steckt, gebt zu, was Ihr seid!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the incident on the mid-deck, Idira? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta knirscht mit ihren Zähnen.{/n} "Das ist nicht das erste Mal, dass diese ... Ketzerin den Tod ihrer Crew verursacht hat. Erinnert Ihr Euch an den Zwischenfall auf dem Mitteldeck, Idira? Was haben diese aufrichtigen Seelen getan, um ein solches Schicksal zu verdienen? In Mutanten verwandelt zu werden und ihre eigenen Familien anzugreifen? Ihr seid ein Monster. Eine Ketzerin. Falls noch eine Spur von Menschlichkeit in Euch steckt, gebt zu, was Ihr seid!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}La mâchoire d'Argenta se crispe.{/n} « Ce n'est pas la première fois que cette... hérétique provoque la mort de son groupe. Vous vous souvenez de l'incident survenu sur le pont intermédiaire, Idira ? Qu'avaient fait ces pauvres bougres pour mériter un tel châtiment ? Par votre faute, ils ont été transformés en mutants et ils se sont retournés contre leurs propres familles. Vous êtes un monstre. Une saleté d'hérétique. S'il vous reste ne serait-ce qu'une once d'humanité, ayez au moins le courage de l'admettre ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the incident on the mid-deck, Idira? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mâchoire d'Argenta se crispe.{/n} « Ce n'est pas la première fois que cette... hérétique provoque la mort de son groupe. Vous vous souvenez de l'incident survenu sur le pont intermédiaire, Idira ? Qu'avaient fait ces pauvres bougres pour mériter un tel châtiment ? Par votre faute, ils ont été transformés en mutants et ils se sont retournés contre leurs propres familles. Vous êtes un monstre. Une saleté d'hérétique. S'il vous reste ne serait-ce qu'une once d'humanité, ayez au moins le courage de l'admettre ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Bu... Bu kâfirin mürettebatın ölümüne sebep olduğu ilk sefer değil. Orta güvertedeki olayı hatırlıyor musun İdira? O mazlum ruhlar öyle bir kaderi hak edecek ne yaptı ki? Mutanta dönüştürüp kendi ailelerine saldırmalarını istedin. Sen bir canavarsın. Kâfirsin. İçinde azıcık insanlık kaldıysa ne olduğunu itiraf et!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta grits her teeth.{/n} "This is not the first time this... heretic has caused the death of her crew. Do you remember the incident on the mid-deck, Idira? What did those honest souls ever do to deserve such a fate? To be turned into mutants and attack their own families? You are a monster. A heretic. If you have any humanity left in you, admit what you are!"

O mazlum ruhlar öyle bir kaderi hak edecek ne yaptı ki? Mutanta dönüştürüp kendi ailelerine saldırmalarını istedin. Sen bir canavarsın. Kâfirsin. İçinde azıcık insanlık kaldıysa ne olduğunu itiraf et!"
